abstract: The company is splitting into two, and refocusing from costly, low-margin business services to higher-value consulting and cross selling.
snippet: The company is splitting into two, and refocusing from costly, low-margin business services to higher-value consulting and cross selling.
lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Calif. — A year ago, Meg Whitman announced she was cutting Hewlett-Packard in two. On Tuesday, she detailed job cuts expected at the company.

headline.main: Hewlett-Packard to Cut About 10 Percent of Work Force
headline.print_headline: Hewlett-Packard Will Reduce Its Work Force by 10 Percent
